sentences.sContent: To picture this, imagine an ice skater doing a pirouette.
sentences.sContent_eng: To picture this, imagine an ice skater doing a pirouette.
sentences.sCn: 为了更加形象化，想像一下溜冰时旋转的场景吧。

sentences.sContent: Roy: You mean you can pirouette and all that sort of thing?
sentences.sContent_eng: Roy: You mean you can pirouette and all that sort of thing?
sentences.sCn: 罗伊：你的意思是你能“单脚着地旋转”和做诸如此类的动作？

remMethod.val: pirou(转) + ette(小动作) → 小转 → 脚尖着地的旋转

trans.tranOther: a dance movement in which the dancer turns very quickly, standing on one toe or the front part of one foot
